text: Claude Peretti (24 February 1942 â€“ 8 September 2020) was a French footballer. He played as a Right midfielder. He won the 1963 Coupe de France with AS Monaco FC. He was born in Nice, France. He then played for Olympique de Marseille before returning to Monaco for a brief time in 1964. In 1965, he joined AC Ajaccio, which won the Ligue 2 championship in 1967. He retired in 1970. Peretti died on 8 September 2020 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Provence- Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:Sportspeople from Nice
title: Claude Peretti
